title: Calmly, Carefully, Completely
description: Sheâ€™s been locked upeven longer than he has.Peter Reed is fresh out of jail, fresh out of excuses, and ready for a brand new start.Reagan Caster needs to thank Pete for an act of kindness, but he wants more than just her thanks.Reagan knows how to protect her body, but not her heart. And her traitorous body responds to Pete in a way it hasn't with anyone else.When Pete's innocent flirtation becomes more, Reagan's ready to accept what he has to offer.Pete assumes Reagan needs to be loved carefully and calmly. But Reagan knows she needs to be loved completely. Can he give her what she needs?
author: Tammy Falkner
